axios å–æ¶ˆè¯·æ±‚çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç  ```ts import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios, { AxiosResponse } from "axios"; export default function App() { const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); const [imgUrl, setImgUrl] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { console.log(`loading ${index}`); const source = axios.CancelToken.source(); axios .get("https://dog.ceo/api/breeds/image/random", { cancelToken: source.token }) .then((res: AxiosResponse<{ message: string; status: string }>) => { console.log(`${index} done`); setImgUrl(res.data.message); }) .catch(err => { if (axios.isCancel(source)) { console.log(err.message); } }); return () => { console.log(`canceling ${index}`); source.cancel(`canceling ${index}`); }; }, [index]); return (
<button onClick={() => { setIndex(index + 1); }} > click </button>
<img src={imgUrl} alt="" />
); } ```

è¿™ä¸ªå’Œè¯·æ±‚çš„å–æ¶ˆå…¶å®å…³ç³»ä¸å¤§ï¼Œä½†ä¸å¦¨å…ˆæ¥äº†è§£ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œaxios ä¸­å¦‚ä½•ç»„ç»‡èµ·æ¥ä¸€ä¸ª Promise é“¾ï¼ˆPromise chainï¼‰ï¼Œä»è€Œå®ç°åœ¨è¯·æ±‚å‰åå¯æ‰§è¡Œä¸€ä¸ªæ‹¦æˆªå™¨ï¼ˆInterceptorï¼‰çš„ã€‚

axios.interceptors.request.use(function (config) {
    console.log('before request')
    return config;
  }, function (error) {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  });

axios.interceptors.response.use(function (response) {
    console.log('after response');
    return response;
  }, function (error) {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  });

ç„¶åæ¯æ¬¡è¯·æ±‚å‰åéƒ½ä¼šæ‰“å°å‡ºç›¸åº”ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæ‹¦æˆªå™¨ç”Ÿæ•ˆäº†ã€‚

ä¸‹é¢ç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªé¡µé¢ï¼Œæ”¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªæŒ‰é’®ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»åå‘èµ·è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œåç»­ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­å°†ä¸€ç›´ä½¿ç”¨è¯¥é¡µé¢æ¥æµ‹è¯•ã€‚

import React from "react";
import axios from "axios";

export default function App() {
  const sendRequest = () => {
    axios.interceptors.request.use(
      config => {
        console.log("before request");
        return config;
      },
      function(error) {
        return Promise.reject(error);
      }
    );

    axios.interceptors.response.use(
      response => {
        console.log("after response");
        return response;
      },
      function(error) {
        return Promise.reject(error);
      }
    );

    axios({
      url: "https://dog.ceo/api/breeds/image/random",
      method: "GET"
    }).then(res => {
      console.log("load success");
    });
  };
  return (
    <div>
      <button onClick={sendRequest}>click me</button>
    </div>
  );
}

æ‹¦æˆªå™¨æœºåˆ¶çš„å®ç°

å®ç°åˆ†ä¸¤æ­¥èµ°ï¼Œå…ˆçœ‹è¯·æ±‚å‰çš„æ‹¦æˆªå™¨ã€‚

è¯·æ±‚å‰æ‹¦æˆªå™¨çš„å®ç°

Promise çš„å¸¸è§„ç”¨æ³•å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

new Promise(resolve,reject);

å‡å¦‚æˆ‘ä»¬å°è£…ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ä¼¼ axios çš„è¯·æ±‚åº“ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è¿™ä¹ˆå†™ï¼š


interface Config {
  url: string;
  method: "GET" | "POST";
}

function request(config: Config) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    xhr.open(config.method, config.url);
    xhr.onload = () => {
      resolve(xhr.responseText);
    };
    xhr.onerror = err => {
      reject(err);
    };
    xhr.send();
  });
}

é™¤äº†åƒä¸Šé¢é‚£ä¸ªç›´æ¥ new ä¸€ä¸ª Promise å¤–ï¼Œå…¶å®ä»»æ„å¯¹è±¡å€¼éƒ½å¯ä»¥å½¢æˆä¸€ä¸ª Promiseï¼Œæ–¹æ³•æ˜¯è°ƒç”¨ Promise.resolveï¼Œ

Promise.resolve(value).then(()=>{ /**... */ });

è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼åˆ›å»º Promise çš„å¥½å¤„æ˜¯ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä» config å¼€å§‹ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª Promise é“¾ï¼Œåœ¨çœŸå®çš„è¯·æ±‚å‘å‡ºå‰ï¼Œå…ˆæ‰§è¡Œä¸€äº›å‡½æ•°ï¼Œåƒè¿™æ ·ï¼š

function request(config: Config) {
  return Promise.resolve(config)
    .then(config => {
      console.log("interceptor 1");
      return config;
    })
    .then(config => {
      console.log("interceptor 2");
      return config;
    })
    .then(config => {
      return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
        const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
        xhr.open(config.method, config.url);
        xhr.onload = () => {
          resolve(xhr.responseText);
        };
        xhr.onerror = err => {
          reject(err);
        };
        xhr.send();
      });
    });
}

è¿™é‡Œï¼Œå·²ç»å®ç°äº† axios ä¸­è¯·æ±‚å‰æ‹¦æˆªå™¨çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚ä»”ç»†è§‚å¯Ÿï¼Œä¸Šé¢ä¸‰ä¸ª then å½“ä¸­çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå½¢æˆäº†ä¸€ä¸ª Promise é“¾ï¼Œåœ¨è¿™ä¸ªé“¾ä¸­é¡ºæ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªéƒ½å¯ä»¥çœ‹æˆä¸€ä¸ªæ‹¦æˆªå™¨ï¼Œå³ä½¿æ˜¯æ‰§è¡Œå‘é€è¯·æ±‚çš„é‚£ä¸ª thenã€‚

äºæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å°†ä»–ä»¬æŠ½å–æˆä¸‰ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå‡½æ•°å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ‹¦æˆªå™¨ã€‚

function interceptor1(config: Config) {
  console.log("interceptor 1");
  return config;
}
function interceptor2(config: Config) {
  console.log("interceptor 2");
  return config;
}

function xmlHttpRequest<T>(config: Config) {
  return new Promise<T>((resolve, reject) => {
    const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    xhr.open(config.method, config.url);
    xhr.onload = () => {
      resolve(xhr.responseText as any);
    };
    xhr.onerror = err => {
      reject(err);
    };
    xhr.send();
  });
}

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥è¦åšçš„ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯ä» Promise é“¾çš„å¤´éƒ¨ Promise.resolve(config) å¼€å§‹ï¼Œå°†ä¸Šé¢ä¸‰ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ä¸²èµ·æ¥ã€‚å€ŸåŠ© Monkey patch è¿™ä¸éš¾å®ç°ï¼š

function request<T = any>(config: Config) {
  let chain: Promise<any> = Promise.resolve(config);
  chain = chain.then(interceptor1);
  chain = chain.then(interceptor2);
  chain = chain.then(xmlHttpRequest);
  return chain as Promise<T>;
}

ç„¶åï¼Œå°†ä¸Šé¢ç¡¬ç¼–ç çš„å†™æ³•ç¨‹å¼åŒ–ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œå°±å®ç°äº†ä»»æ„ä¸ªè¯·æ±‚å‰æ‹¦æˆªå™¨çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

æ‰©å±•é…ç½®ï¼Œä»¥æ¥æ”¶æ‹¦æˆªå™¨ï¼š

interface Config {
  url: string;
  method: "GET" | "POST";
  interceptors?: Interceptor<Config>[];
}

åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ï¼Œå°†æ‰§è¡Œè¯·æ±‚çš„å‡½æ•°åšä¸ºé»˜è®¤çš„å…ƒç´ æ”¾è¿›å»ï¼Œç„¶åå°†ç”¨æˆ·é…ç½®çš„æ‹¦æˆªå™¨å‹å…¥æ•°ç»„å‰é¢ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å½¢æˆäº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ‹¦æˆªå™¨çš„æ•°ç»„ã€‚æœ€åå†éå†è¿™ä¸ªæ•°ç»„å½¢æˆ Promise é“¾ã€‚

function request<T = any>({ interceptors = [], ...config }: Config) {
  // å‘é€è¯·æ±‚çš„æ‹¦æˆªå™¨ä¸ºé»˜è®¤ï¼Œç”¨æˆ·é…ç½®çš„æ‹¦æˆªå™¨å‹å…¥æ•°ç»„å‰é¢
  const tmpInterceptors: Interceptor<any>[] = [xmlHttpRequest];
  interceptors.forEach(interceptor => {
    tmpInterceptors.unshift(interceptor);
  });
  let chain: Promise<any> = Promise.resolve(config);
  tmpInterceptors.forEach(interceptor => (chain = chain.then(interceptor)));
  return chain as Promise<T>;
}

ç»§ç»­æ‰©å±•é…ç½®ï¼Œå°†è¯·æ±‚ä¸å“åº”çš„æ‹¦æˆªå™¨åˆ†å¼€ï¼š

interface Config {
  url: string;
  method: "GET" | "POST";
  interceptors?: {
    request: Interceptor<Config>[];
    response: Interceptor<any>[];
  };
}

æ›´æ–° request æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¯·æ±‚å‰æ‹¦æˆªå™¨çš„é€»è¾‘ä¸å˜ï¼Œå°†æ–°å¢çš„å“åº”æ‹¦æˆªå™¨é€šè¿‡ push å‹å…¥æ•°ç»„åé¢ï¼š


function request<T = any>({
  interceptors = { request: [], response: [] },
  ...config
}: Config) {
  const tmpInterceptors: Interceptor<any>[] = [xmlHttpRequest];
  interceptors.request.forEach(interceptor => {
    tmpInterceptors.unshift(interceptor);
  });

  interceptors.response.forEach(interceptor => {
    tmpInterceptors.push(interceptor);
  });

  let chain: Promise<any> = Promise.resolve(config);
  tmpInterceptors.forEach(interceptor => (chain = chain.then(interceptor)));
  return chain as Promise<T>;
}

ç±»ä¼¼ interceptor1 interceptor2ï¼Œæ–°å¢ä¸¤ä¸ªæ‹¦æˆªå™¨ç”¨äºå“åº”åæ‰§è¡Œï¼Œ

  console.log("interceptor 3");
  return res;
}

function interceptor4<T>(res: T) {
  console.log("interceptor 4");
  return res;
}

function adapter(config: Config) {
  return xmlHttpRequest(config).then(
    res => {
      throw "baddie!";
    },
    err => {
      throw "baddie!";
    }
  );
}

æ›´æ–° request å‡½æ•°ä½¿ç”¨ adapter è€Œä¸æ˜¯ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ xmlHttpRequestï¼š

function request<T = any>({
  interceptors = { request: [], response: [] },
  ...config

é¢å¤–åœ°ï¼Œ

  • å¦‚æœæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå­—æ®µè®°å½•å–æ¶ˆçš„åŸå› ï¼Œé‚£ä¹Ÿä¸é”™ã€‚

ç”±æ­¤æˆ‘ä»¬å¾—åˆ°è¿™ä¹ˆä¸€ä¸ªç±»ï¼š

class CancelTokenSource {
  private _canceled = false;
  get canceled() {
    return this._canceled;
  }
  private _message = "unknown reason";
  get message() {
    return this._message;
  }

  cancel(reason?: string) {
    if (this.canceled) return;
    if (reason) {
      this._message = reason;
    }
    this._canceled = true;
  }
}

æ·»åŠ  token åˆ°é…ç½®

æ‰©å±•é…ç½®ï¼Œä»¥æ¥æ”¶ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æ¥å–æ¶ˆçš„ token å¯¹è±¡ï¼š

interface Config {
  url: string;
  method: "GET" | "POST";
+  cancelToken?: CancelTokenSource;
  interceptors?: {
    request: Interceptor<Config>[];
    response: Interceptor<any>[];
  };
}

è¯·æ±‚é€»è¾‘ä¸­å¤„ç†å–æ¶ˆ

åŒæ—¶æ›´æ–° xmlHttpRequest å‡½æ•°ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­ token çš„çŠ¶æ€æ˜¯å¦è°ƒç”¨è¿‡å–æ¶ˆï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯åˆ™è°ƒç”¨ xhr.abort()ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æ·»åŠ  onabort å›è°ƒä»¥ reject æ‰ Promise:


function xmlHttpRequest<T>(config: Config) {
  return new Promise<T>((resolve, reject) => {
    const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    xhr.open(config.method, config.url);
    xhr.onload = () => {
      resolve(xhr.responseText as any);
    };
    xhr.onerror = err => {
      reject(err);
    };
+    xhr.onabort = () => {
+      reject();
+    };
+    if (config.cancelToken) {
+      xhr.abort();
+    }
    xhr.send();
  });
}

å–æ¶ˆçš„è°ƒç”¨

å°†æŠ›å¼‚å¸¸çš„ä»£ç æŠ½å–æˆæ–¹æ³•ä»¥åœ¨å¤šå¤„è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œæ›´æ–° adapter çš„é€»è¾‘ï¼Œåœ¨æ²¡æœ‰å–æ¶ˆçš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹æ­£å¸¸è¿”å›å’Œ rejectã€‚

function throwIfCancelRequested(config: Config) {
  if (config.cancelToken && config.cancelToken.canceled) {
    throw config.cancelToken.message;
  }
}

function adapter(config: Config) {
  throwIfCancelRequested(config);
  return xmlHttpRequest(config).then(
    res => {
      throwIfCancelRequested(config);
      return res;
    },
    err => {
      throwIfCancelRequested(config);
      return Promise.reject(err);
    }
  );
}

æµ‹è¯•è¯·æ±‚çš„å–æ¶ˆ

ä¼¼ä¹ä¸€åˆ‡ okayï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥æµ‹è¯•ä¸€æ³¢ã€‚ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç æœŸæœ›æ¯æ¬¡ç‚¹å‡»æŒ‰é’®å‘èµ·è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œè¯·æ±‚å‰å…ˆå–æ¶ˆæ‰ä¹‹å‰çš„è¯·æ±‚ã€‚ä¸ºäº†åŒºåˆ†æ¯æ¬¡ä¸åŒçš„è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œæ·»åŠ  index å˜é‡ï¼ŒæŒ‰é’®ç‚¹å‡»æ—¶è‡ªå¢ã€‚

import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";

export default function App() {
  const [index, setIndex] = useState(0);

  useEffect(() => {
    const token = new CancelTokenSource();
    request({
      url: "https://dog.ceo/api/breeds/image/random",
      method: "GET",
      cancelToken: token,
      interceptors: {
        request: [interceptor1, interceptor2],
        response: [interceptor3, interceptor4]
      }
    })
      .then(res => {
        console.log(`load ${index} success`);
      })
      .catch(err => {
        console.log("outer catch ", err);
      });

    return () => {
      token.cancel(`just cancel ${index}`);
    };
  }, [index]);

  return (
    <div>
      <button
        onClick={() => {
          setIndex(index + 1);
        }}
      >
        click me
      </button>
    </div>
  );
}

åŠ è½½é¡µé¢è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼ŒuseEffect ä¼šåœ¨é¡µé¢åŠ è½½åé¦–æ¬¡è¿è¡Œï¼Œä¼šè§¦å‘ä¸€æ¬¡å®Œæ•´çš„è¯·æ±‚æµç¨‹ã€‚ç„¶åè¿ç»­ç‚¹å‡»ä¸¤æ¬¡æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œä»¥å–æ¶ˆæ‰ä¸¤æ¬¡ä¸­çš„å‰ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚è¿è¡Œç»“æœï¼š

  • xhr.abort() æ²¡æœ‰ç”Ÿæ•ˆï¼Œè¿ç»­çš„ä¸¤æ¬¡ç‚¹å‡»ä¸­ï¼Œæµè§ˆå™¨è°ƒè¯•å·¥å…·ä¸­ä¼šæœ‰ä¸¤æ¡çŠ¶æ€ä¸º 200 çš„è¯·æ±‚ã€‚
  • ç¬¬ä¸€æ¡è¯·æ±‚åç»­çš„å›è°ƒç¡®å®è¢«å–æ¶ˆæ‰äº†ï¼Œä½†å®ƒæ˜¯åœ¨ç­‰å¾…è¯·æ±‚æˆåŠŸåï¼Œåœ¨æˆåŠŸå›è°ƒä¸­å–æ¶ˆçš„ï¼Œè¿™ç‚¹å¯é€šè¿‡åœ¨å–æ¶ˆå‡½æ•°ä¸­æ·»åŠ æ ‡å¿—ä½æ¥æŸ¥çœ‹ã€‚
function throwIfCancelRequested(config: Config, flag?: number) {
  if (config.cancelToken && config.cancelToken.canceled) {
    console.log(flag);
    throw config.cancelToken.message;
  }
}

function adapter(config: Config) {
  throwIfCancelRequested(config, 1);
  return xmlHttpRequest(config).then(
    res => {
    //â„¹ åç»­è¾“å‡ºè¯æ˜ï¼Œå®é™…ç”Ÿæ•ˆçš„æ˜¯æ­¤å¤„
      throwIfCancelRequested(config, 2);
      return res;
    },
    err => {
    //â„¹ è€Œéæ­¤å¤„ï¼Œå³ä½¿å–æ¶ˆçš„åŠ¨ä½œæ˜¯åœ¨è¯·æ±‚è¿›è¡Œè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­
      throwIfCancelRequested(config, 3);
      return Promise.reject(err);
    }
  );
}

ä¸‹é¢çš„ä¼˜åŒ–éœ€è¦è§£å†³ä¸Šé¢çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚æ‰€ç”¨åˆ°çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¾¿æ˜¯ axios ä¸­çš„é€»è¾‘ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€å¼€å§‹çœ‹æºç ä¼šä¸å¤ªç†è§£çš„åœ°æ–¹ã€‚

å…¶å®å¤–éƒ¨è°ƒç”¨ cancel() çš„æ—¶æœºå¹¶ä¸ç¡®å®šï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ token å¯¹è±¡ä¸Šè®°å½•å…¶æ˜¯å¦è¢«å–æ¶ˆçš„å­—æ®µï¼Œä½•æ—¶è¢«ç½®ä¸º true æ˜¯ä¸ç¡®å®šçš„ï¼Œå› æ­¤ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å–æ¶ˆè¯·æ±‚çš„é€»è¾‘ï¼ˆxhr.abort()ï¼‰åº”è¯¥æ˜¯åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ª Promise ä¸­æ¥å®Œæˆã€‚

å› æ­¤ï¼Œåœ¨ CancelTokenSource ç±»ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª Promise ç±»å‹çš„å­—æ®µï¼Œå®ƒä¼šåœ¨ cancel() æ–¹æ³•è¢«è°ƒç”¨çš„æ—¶å€™ resolve æ‰ã€‚

æ›´æ–°åçš„ CancelTokenSource ç±»ï¼š

class CancelTokenSource {
  public promise: Promise<unknown>;
  private resolvePromise!: (value?: any) => void;
  constructor() {
    this.promise = new Promise(resolve => {
      this.resolvePromise = resolve;
    });
  }
  private _canceled = false;
  get canceled() {
    return this._canceled;
  }
  private _message = "unknown reason";
  get message() {
    return this._message;
  }

  cancel(reason?: string) {
    if (reason) {
      this._message = reason;
    }
    this._canceled = true;
    this.resolvePromise();
  }
}

æ›´æ–°åè®¿é—® canceled å­—æ®µçš„é€»è¾‘ï¼š

function xmlHttpRequest<T>(config: Config) {
  return new Promise<T>((resolve, reject) => {
    const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    xhr.open(config.method, config.url);
    xhr.onload = () => {
      resolve(xhr.responseText as any);
    };
    xhr.onerror = err => {
      reject(err);
    };
    xhr.onabort = () => {
      reject();
    };
    if (config.cancelToken) {
      config.cancelToken.promise.then(() => {
        xhr.abort();
      });
    }
    xhr.send();
  });
}

å®Œæ•´ä»£ç 

è‡ªå·±å®ç°çš„è¯·æ±‚å–æ¶ˆæœºåˆ¶å®Œæ•´ä»£ç  ```tsx import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; class CancelTokenSource { public promise: Promise; private resolvePromise!: (value?: any) => void; constructor() { this.promise = new Promise(resolve => { this.resolvePromise = resolve; }); } private _canceled = false; get canceled() { return this._canceled; } private _message = "unknown reason"; get message() { return this._message; } cancel(reason?: string) { if (reason) { this._message = reason; } this._canceled = true; this.resolvePromise(); } } type Interceptor = (value: T) => T | Promise; interface Config { url: string; method: "GET" | "POST"; cancelToken?: CancelTokenSource; interceptors?: { request: Interceptor[]; response: Interceptor[]; }; } function interceptor1(config: Config) { console.log("interceptor 1"); return config; } function interceptor2(config: Config) { console.log("interceptor 2"); return config; } function interceptor3(res: T) { console.log("interceptor 3"); return res; } function interceptor4(res: T) { console.log("interceptor 4"); return res; } function xmlHttpRequest(config: Config) { return new Promise((resolve, reject) => { const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open(config.method, config.url); xhr.onload = () => { resolve(xhr.responseText as any); }; xhr.onerror = err => { reject(err); }; xhr.onabort = () => { reject(); }; if (config.cancelToken) { config.cancelToken.promise.then(() => { xhr.abort(); }); } xhr.send(); }); } function throwIfCancelRequested(config: Config, flag?: number) { if (config.cancelToken && config.cancelToken.canceled) { console.log(flag); throw config.cancelToken.message; } } function adapter(config: Config) { throwIfCancelRequested(config, 1); return xmlHttpRequest(config).then( res => { throwIfCancelRequested(config, 2); return res; }, err => { throwIfCancelRequested(config, 3); return Promise.reject(err); } ); } function request<T = any>({ interceptors = { request: [], response: [] }, ...config }: Config) { const tmpInterceptors: Interceptor[] = [adapter]; interceptors.request.forEach(interceptor => { tmpInterceptors.unshift(interceptor); }); interceptors.response.forEach(interceptor => { tmpInterceptors.push(interceptor); }); let chain: Promise = Promise.resolve(config); tmpInterceptors.forEach(interceptor => (chain = chain.then(interceptor))); return chain as Promise; } export default function App() { const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const token = new CancelTokenSource(); request({ url: "https://dog.ceo/api/breeds/image/random", method: "GET", cancelToken: token, interceptors: { request: [interceptor1, interceptor2], response: [interceptor3, interceptor4] } }) .then(res => { console.log(`load ${index} success`); }) .catch(err => { console.log("outer catch ", err); }); return () => { token.cancel(`just cancel ${index}`); }; }, [index]); return (
<button onClick={() => { setIndex(index + 1); }} > click me </button>
); } ``` </details> ![è¿è¡Œæ•ˆæœ](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3783096/66497136-99811380-eaee-11e9-963d-5d8fd664562f.gif)
